ygData.subject: Faction Advertising Update

Subject: Faction Advertising Update
Message-ID: <9589cl+9dd9@...>

Content-Length: 1313
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

So far the vote for faction advertising is unanimoustly for it, so I 
have already started working on the system. I got the generator 
working (to see a working version, go to http://nbwrpg.com/nbwrpg/cgi-
bin/ad.cgi . This version just spits back a random banner, choosing 
between the one drawn by Megan (which is on the main site), and the 
one drawn by Robo (which is on the eGroups page, 
http://egroups.com/group/nbwrpg). The ad system works just like this 
does, by spitting back an image, only it'll be working with linked 
ads instead of banners.)

The only thing I have left is to figure out how to implement this 
thing into the actual web page. So far I can't get my server 
configured to do that, but I'm trying!

I will do some research tomorrow and will then post the specific 
guidelines for banners and faction descriptions, and as soon as I 
have this whole flippin' thing up, you guys can send everything in.


Also: Dachande, thanx for reminding me about Zergling (rather 
creative reminder, may I add). I'll get him out as soon as Squizzy is 
done with Vamprah's optics.


Ok, I've babbled for long enough. I'm off to bed. Goodnight everyone!


(Faction commanders, start writing descriptions! My guidelines will 
more likely make you write more instead of less, so it won't hurt to 
start.)
